thread.title: Lad gets Kevin De Bruyne’s shirt, celebrates like a king before being caught (Videos)
thread.title_full: Lad gets Kevin De Bruyne’s shirt, celebrates like a king before being caught (Videos)

author: Benjamin Newman
title: Lad gets Kevin De Bruyne’s shirt, celebrates like a king before being caught (Videos)
text:
Lad gets Kevin De Bruyne’s shirt, celebrates like a king before being caught (Videos) By Benjamin Newman   Lad & Kevin De Bruyne 
There was a hilarious moment after the full time whistle blew at the Etihad Stadium on Tuesday night involving Man City star Kevin De Bruyne . 
As the Belgium international was strolling around the pitch after the game, a lad managed to get onto the pitch, hug the Man City star, and convince KBD to hand him his shirt. 
As KBD walked away, suddenly the lad made a run for it as stewards came closing in. 
De Bruyne caught what happened and laughed.
